title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisites: NoneCourse ContentsIntroduction and Main Features; Structure of the Indian economy at the time of independence; Development Strategies from 1951 to 1991: Emergence of Mixed Economy; Economic Planning - Objectives, Strategies, Policies, Main achievements and setbacks under different five-year plans; Major Problems with their Dimensions: Poverty, Unemployment, Inequality, Rural-Urban Disparities, Trade Imbalances, External Debt, Inflation and other Instabilities, Macro management Policies - Monetary, Fiscal, Trade, Administrative, etc; Growth of Income and Employment: Rate, Pattern and Disparities; Economic Reforms since 1991; Contemporary Economic Problems and Issues; Indiaâs Position in the World Economy.
